sourceOfFunds.purpose: Our Society is Self funding and non-governmental organization is any non-profit, voluntary citizens group which is organized on a local, national or international level. Task-oriented and driven by people with a common interest, NGOs perform a variety of service and humanitarian functions, bring citizen concerns to Governments, advocate and monitor policies and encourage political participation through provision of information. Some are organized around specific issues, such as human rights

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Established in 1990, KIRAN Centre is a non-profit and non-governmental organization based in Varanasi (Uttar Pradesh). The organization works to improve the lives of people with disabilities and their families. KIRAN Centre won Indias best NGO-award in 2007/8 from National Trust (under the ministry of Social Justice and Empowerment) and Best NGO award from Uttar Pradesh Government in 2006. At first KIRAN started rehabilitation and non-formal education activities in the city of Varanasi for 7 years. Since 1998 we shifted to Madhopur, 12 km south of the city where we have established a kind of inclusive mini-village where 230 children with different disabilities and economically poor non-disabled ones study and receive together counseling, primary-education, special education, grihini-services for uneducated young women, skill-training as well as all necessary rehabilitation-services. Emphasis is given to creating in these children an open mind for their capacities and their different rights. Simultaneously a team of experienced personnel is regularly present in 30 villages of Mirzapur district for intensive right based CBR with stress on creating SHGs, and another team of experts visits every month villages in different districts of U.P. and Bihar for rehabilitation services.
